1.content:
Camp Zodiac it a place that protects and trains all mortal children of the 88 constellations, otherwise known as Demigods or Star Childs, created by the great rulers of Heaven, the Zodiac. During the first day, a symbol will appear on the child's hand, indicating which god they are the child of, the exception is the children of the great Zodiac, the symbol will appear on the part of the body that god represents (For what each of those are, go here https://www.elitedaily.com/p/each-zodiac...)

Once the child has been chosen they may choose a cabin to enter. There are twelve cabins at camp, the children of the Zodiac must sleep in their parent's respective cabin but the children of minor gods may choose the cabin they enter. The cabins are located in a square, with three cabins on each side, all facing a central courtyard. Behind the Aries, Taurus and Gemini cabins are the training grounds, with areas for sword fighting, agility and endurance training and combat training, along with the dining hall and bathrooms. Across the square, behind the Libra, Scorpio and Sagittarius cabins is a large forest stocked with monsters that can be hunted at any time. Behind the Pisces cabin is a large lake for swimming, canoeing or any other water activities as well as the opportunity to fight aquatic monsters. And finally, being the Leo building is the staff office and headquarters and entrance to the camp, which campers are not allowed to cross unless they are given permission to do so. Permission could come in the form of authorised excursions or granted quests.

Some things to note about the Constellations in question. Virgo does not have any children, considering she is the sign of the virgin. Even among the other Zodiac, besides Scorpio perhaps, there won't be too many children, as these children are quite powerful.

Speaking of this, the children are allowed to have powers based on their parent, this can range from basic manipulation of the element their parent represents to more unusual abilities, like the child of Pisces being able to spiritually, or literally, tie themselves to someone.

So, what cabin will your character be in?
1.title: Welcome To Camp Zodiac!

11.content:
The fire signs are known for being energetic and, in some cases, aggressive, they like to play rough, have fun and be free!

Which Cabin Will you enter?

Cabin One: Aries Cabin

Cabin Five: Leo Cabin

Cabin Nine: Sagittarius Cabin
11.title: Fire Cabins

111.content:
Cabin One: Aries The Flying Ram

The Aries Cabin is built much like a mini castle, it's a circular tower made of dark stone lined with battlements. At the foot of the tower is an iron door and above that is a glowing Aries symbol. Inside, the bunks are designed much like how you'd find them in a military camp, apart from that there isn't too much else inside, as the Aries kids prefer the outdoors. There is a trap door leading to the top of the tower.

There is currently no head camper of the Aries Cabin.


Who will be entering?
111.title: Aries Cabin

112.content:
Cabin Five: Leo The Great Lion

The Leo cabin is the largest and brightest of the cabins, it's designed like a building straight out of Hollywood, with the large spotlights and the red carpet leading inside. A large illuminated Leo symbol rests on the flat roof of the first floor, standing in front of the second and third floors. The first floor is decked out like a disco, with a DJ booth and dance floor complete with disco ball, the second and third floors hold the rooms, each camper gets their own private room.

The Head Camper for the Leo cabin is Mavis. The sixteen-year-old daughter of Leo. She has the power of photokinesis and a sharp tongue, though that was through practice. She's spunky and little up herself but will always welcome people into the cabin to have fun at the disco.

Who will be entering?
112.title: Leo Cabin

12.content:
The earth signs are often very grounded and humble, a little judgmental at times, and very stubborn, they like it their way.

Which Cabin will you enter?

Cabin Two: Taurus Cabin

Cabin Six: Virgo Cabin

Cabin Ten: Capricorn Cabin
12.title: Earth Cabins

121.content:
Cabin Two: Taurus The Golden Bull

The Taurus Cabin is very humble looking, appearing as a large hollowed out rock with a simple wooden door and the Taurus symbol engraved above it. Inside the floor is wooden and to the two sides of the room are the two most important things for any Taurus, beds and a kitchen. To the right, the beds are stacked up but placed so that they can easily be entered at any time and a fully functional kitchen is to the left in case the campers want a midnight snack.

The Head Camper of the Taurus cabin is the fourteen-year-old son of Taurus, Wallace. He's cheerful, if not a little timid, and loves to help out people (or let them sneak into the kitchen for some food). He has Geokinesis as well as possessing enhanced durability and strength.

Who will be entering?
121.title: Taurus Cabin

122.content:
Cabin Six: Virgo The Virgin Goddess

The Virgo cabin looks just like an ordinary cabin you'd find at any summer camp. It's made of wood with a Virgo symbol painted neatly above the door. The cabins are lined up against the wall like you'd expect, leaving plenty of room in the middle for the campers to chat or play games. Unlike the other cabins, Virgo will only allow women to sleep there.

There is currently no Head Camper for the Virgo cabin.

Who will be entering?
122.title: Virgo Cabin

123.content:
Cabin Ten: Capricorn The Goat of Fear

Very few words can describe the Capricorn cabin better than creepy. It's made entirely of black stone with two streams of what appears to be lava running down the outer corners. The entrance doesn't have a door but instead three pillars to walk through and the inside isn't much better. At the back of the room, there is an altar that looks like a goat head with everlasting fire for the eyes. There are also two torches on either side of the room. The beds are spread out evenly throughout the room and are of surprisingly good quality.

No one has been brave enough to sleep at the Capricorn cabin and as such, there is no Head Camper as of yet.


Who dares to enter?
123.title: Capricorn Cabin

13.content:
The air signs are caring and friendly, a little all over the place, and in the case of Gemini, hyperactive, but doing what's best for the people around them is always in their best interest.

Which Cabin will you enter?

Cabin Three: Gemini Cabin

Cabin Seven: Libra Cabin

Cabin Eleven: Aquarius Cabin
13.title: Air Cabins

131.content:
Cabin Three: Gemini The Twins

Much like the sign it represents, the Gemini cabin is split into twin, two-story buildings, one with black walls and a large white Gemini sign, and one with white walls and a large black Gemini sign. The room that connects the two has grey walls. The first floor is a lobby with all kinds of different activities available, a large TV, video games, billiards table, board games, anything you'd need. The upper floor of both towers is for the beds.

The Gemini Cabin has two Head Campers, thirteen-year-old twins Rex and Grayson. Though they are the sons of Gemini they don't seem to possess any supernatural powers, though they could be concealing them. They are friendly but mischievous and love to have a good laugh, at anyone's expense.

Who will be entering?
131.title: Gemini Cabin

132.content:
Cabin Seven: Libra The Heavenly Scales

There is no realistic way the Libra cabin should still be standing. It has a first floor only big enough for the staircase and two, second-floor rooms to either side. The building is made of white marble with a golden Libra symbol over the door. The right room has beds for the female campers and the left for males.

The Head Camper of the Libra cabin is currently Willis, the shy son of Monoceros. Though he is granted the ridiculously powerful ability of Essokinesis he doesn't know how to use it very well. He's hard to talk to at first, but once he warms up to you he's sweet.

Who will be entering?
132.title: Libra Cabin

14.content:
The water signs, unlike the element they represent, aren't very calm, in fact, they can get very emotional very easy, with the exception of Scorpio. Though they are very creative and artistic in many forms of art.

Which Cabin will you enter?

Cabin Four: Cancer Cabin

Cabin Eight: Scorpio Cabin

Cabin Twelve: Pisces Cabin
14.title: Water Cabins

141.content:
Cabin Four: Cancer The Giant Crab

The Cancer cabin is quaint and pretty cozy, it is the smallest of the cabins and shaped like the top half and clippers of a crab, with the symbol above the door like the other cabins. Inside there are four sets of bunk beds and up against the back wall is a saltwater fountain, giving the room a calm and therapeutic smell and sound.

The Head Camper for the Cancer cabin is Oskar, a son of Canis, the dog. He is fifteen and has the ability to communicate with animals. He can also transform into any member of the canine family.

Who will be entering?
141.title: Cancer Cabin

143.content:
Cabin Twelve: Pisces The Paired Fish

The Pisces cabin is an open wooden structure floating on the lake. it has light wooden floorboards and pillars surrounding it and a blue roof. Unlike the other cabins, the symbol is not painted above the entrance but instead is a large glass symbol, allowing the campers to look down into the water below. The beds are hammocks and there is a lot of sea-themed decoration. At the back, there is an open platform where campers can fish or swim, though no one knows what lies at the bottom of the lake so be cautious.

The Head Camper for the Pisces cabin is the oldest (and by self-appointment, most talented, though Mavis might disagree) camper at Camp Zodiac. Griffin is the seventeen-year-old son of Pisces and as such had the ability to breathe underwater, communicate with fish, and use Aquakinesis. He's the person to go to if you want support or need someone to listen to your problems because he's always happy to be there for anyone.


Who will be entering?
143.title: Pisces Cabin

info.brief_description: For all children of the constellations! Full of activities, monsters and quests!
info.description:
Camp Zodiac, a safe haven for all children of the mighty Zodiacs and other constellations. There are activities to help everyone stay safe from monsters, as well as activities to just have a good time.

Hey Everyone! This interactive is obviously a parody of the Percy Jackson book series. Only instead of the Greek gods, our characters will be the children of the Zodiacs, who are the replacement for the gods in this story. More about the camp itself and how the interactive will work are on the first page.

Now for the rules!

This is a 13+ story: I'm sure you can read up on the specifics of what that means but essentially make it appropriate for young teens and older to be reading. (Note that most of the characters are probably teens as well so they shouldn't really get involved with all that stuff anyway)

As far as the monsters are concerned, though the Zodiacs are technically Latin, you're free to refer to them by their Greek names, I'm sure most people would be more familiar with the Greek counterpart as opposed to the Roman one. But if a story starts with Roman monsters try to stick to them being Roman, unless you give a reason as to why the characters are suddenly using the Greek equivalent.

Nice long chapters! No one likes one-liners, they waste chapters, there's no point asking people if they want the character to be called Fred or Mike, just pick the name you like and if someone doesn't like the name, they can always make a different storyline with their own characters.

Allow multiple characters: When starting a story, make sure to leave an option for someone to create a different character, not everyone wants to play the same character as you do, and hey, with more characters being made you could even have them appear in another character's story as friends or something.

Go Wild! As long as you stick to the 13+ get a crazy as you want with the stories, these are your stories and you can shape them in any way you want. You want your character to have a 50-foot One eye one horn flying purple people eater? then go right ahead (Though maybe teach it to eat pork instead) I'm not going to delete chapters for being too crazy, as long as the other rules are followed you have free reign.

Oh, if any of you were wondering what the Greek God to Zodiac conversion would be, here are my thoughts.

Aries - Ares

Taurus - Hera

Gemini - Artemis and Apollo

Cancer - Demeter

Leo - Zeus

Virgo - Hestia

Libra - Nemesis (Or Hermes)

Scorpio - Aphrodite

Sagittarius - Hephestus

Capricorn - Hades (Or Dionysus)

Aquarius - Athena

Pisces - Poseidon
